DOC.brief_summary: Aim study compare benefit disadvantage use continuous infusion morphine fentanyl post operative analgesia .
DOC.brief_title: Post Operative Pain Control : Morphine v Fentanyl
DOC.criteria: ASA 1 2 patient undergoing major gynaecological surgery age > 60 year obesity ( BMI > 30 Kg/m2 ) cardiac respiratory disease renal impairment liver disorder allergy drug use study
